alert.note: Alert for Clay; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 4:53PM MDT until June 24 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Clay County in southeastern South Dakota... East central Yankton County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 552 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located just north of Mission Hill, or 8 miles northeast of Yankton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Volin around 605 PM CDT. Wakonda around 610 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gayville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
